definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="List" id="attributes_value">attributes_value</variable><variable type="String" id="afective_name">afective_name</variable><variable type="Number" id="points">points</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="variables_set_arraylist"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attributes_value</field><value name="VAL"><block type="procedure_retval_arraylist"><field name="procedure">GetAttributes</field></block></value><next><block type="variables_set_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:afective_name</field><value name="VAL"><block type="variables_get_string"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:bgames_afective_name</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">int i = 0;</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="arraylist_isempty"><value name="var"><block type="variables_get_arraylist"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:attributes_value</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="1"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">0 points</field></block></value></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">for (i = 0; i < attributes_value.size(); i++) {&#10;</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">        JsonObject attribute= new Gson().fromJson( attributes_value.get(i).toString(), JsonObject.class);&#10;</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">attribute.get("name").getAsString().equals(afective_name)</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:points</field><value name="VAL"><block type="java_code_get"><field name="CODE">attribute.get("data").getAsInt()</field></block></value><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">i=attributes_value.size();&#10;</field></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">}&#10;</field><next><block type="return_string"><value name="return"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="variables_get_number"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:points</field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">points</field></block></value></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
